text:
Answer concisely (1–2 sentences):
Who first discovered that vitamin C prevents scurvy?
What is the role of vitamin C in the immune system?
What are the benefits of consuming vitamin C-rich foods?
What are the potential side effects of consuming too much vitamin C?
What are the recommended daily intake of vitamin C for adults?
What are the recommended daily intake of vitamin C for children?
What are the recommended daily intake of vitamin C for pregnant women?
What are the recommended daily intake of vitamin C for lactating women?
What are the recommended daily intake of vitamin C for individuals
